29#include "gprof.h"
30#include "hertz.h"
31
32
33int
34hertz (void)
35{
36#ifdef HERTZ
37 return HERTZ;
38#else /* ! defined (HERTZ) */
39#ifdef HAVE_SETITIMER
40 struct itimerval tim;
41
42 tim.it_interval.tv_sec = 0;
43 tim.it_interval.tv_usec = 1;
44 tim.it_value.tv_sec = 0;
45 tim.it_value.tv_usec = 0;
46 setitimer (ITIMER_REAL, &tim, 0);
47 setitimer (ITIMER_REAL, 0, &tim);
48 if (tim.it_interval.tv_usec >= 2)
49 {
50 return 1000000 / tim.it_interval.tv_usec;
51 }
52#endif /* ! defined (HAVE_SETITIMER) */
53#if defined (HAVE_SYSCONF) && defined (_SC_CLK_TCK)
54 return sysconf (_SC_CLK_TCK);
55#else /* ! defined (HAVE_SYSCONF) || ! defined (_SC_CLK_TCK) */
56#ifdef __MSDOS__
57 return 18;
58#else /* ! defined (__MSDOS__) */
59 return HZ_WRONG;
60#endif /* ! defined (__MSDOS__) */
61#endif /* ! defined (HAVE_SYSCONF) || ! defined (_SC_CLK_TCK) */
62#endif /* ! defined (HERTZ) */
63}
64
